<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18691>

            Bug ID: 18691
           Summary: clarification of NaN/NA documentation
           Product: R
           Version: R-devel (trunk)
          Hardware: Other
                OS: Linux
            Status: UNCONFIRMED
          Severity: enhancement
          Priority: P5
         Component: Documentation
          Assignee: <mailto:R-core@R-project.org|R-core@R-project.org>
          Reporter: <mailto:bbolker@gmail.com|bbolker@gmail.com>

Created attachment 3323
  --> <https://bugs.r-project.org/attachment.cgi?id=3323&action=edit>
mods to NA.Rd, is.finite.Rd, numeric.Rd

This patch is largely from Aki Vehtari, with some suggestions by me.

Starting from frustrations and confusion described in [this Mastodon
thread](<https://fediscience.org/@avehtari@bayes.club/112043521852737720>) and
discussed [here](<https://github.com/avehtari/r-source/pull/1>).

text:
*[Bug 18692] New: 'Installing the package to build vignettes' is ambiguous*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18692>

            Bug ID: 18692
           Summary: 'Installing the package to build vignettes' is
                    ambiguous
           Product: R
           Version: R-devel (trunk)
          Hardware: All
                OS: All
            Status: UNCONFIRMED
          Severity: minor
          Priority: P5
         Component: Installation
          Assignee: <mailto:R-core@R-project.org|R-core@R-project.org>
          Reporter: <mailto:michaelchirico4@gmail.com|michaelchirico4@gmail.com>

Created attachment 3324
  --> <https://bugs.r-project.org/attachment.cgi?id=3324&action=edit>
Clarify wording when building vignettes

For years I have been reading "the package to build vignettes" as implying _the
`VignetteBuilder` package_ is being installed, leaving me vaguely puzzled as to
why that needs to be installed every time I want to build the package.

I was finally motivated to check the source today and quickly realized "the
package" in question is _the package being built_, which is a lot easier to
comprehend.

Therefore I'm proposing a small patch to the wording here that I hope will
prevent this mistake for future readers.

For years I have been reading "the package to build vignettes" as implying _the

package_ is being installed, leaving me vaguely puzzled as to
why that needs to be installed every time I want to build the package.

I was finally motivated to check the source today and quickly realized "the
package" in question is

, which is a lot easier to
comprehend.

Therefore I'm proposing a small patch to the wording here that I hope will
prevent this mistake for future readers.
